body_html: @Mr-Grieves It could be thermal throttling slowing down the CPU frequency after sustained load. I'm not sure if you can view this in Android Studio, but you could try printing the frequency manually via adb shell and see if it changes during a run.
body_text: @Mr-Grieves It could be thermal throttling slowing down the CPU frequency after sustained load. I'm not sure if you can view this in Android Studio, but you could try printing the frequency manually via adb shell and see if it changes during a run.
body: @Mr-Grieves It could be thermal throttling slowing down the CPU frequency after sustained load. I'm not sure if you can view this in Android Studio, but you could try [printing the frequency](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3021054/how-to-read-cpu-frequency-on-android-device) manually via `adb shell` and see if it changes during a run.
